com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb
Interface Database

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDatabase, DerbyDatabase, HSQLDBDatabase
public interface Database

Describes the operations that are used by the Mojos to launch in-memory databases, load data into, execute scripts against or shutdown the database.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Brian Matthews

Method Summary
 DataSource getDataSource()
          Get the data source that describes the connection to the in-memory database.
 DataSource getDataSource(Map<String,String> attributes)
          Get the data source that describes the connection to the in-memory database.
 void load(Logger logger, File source)
          Find the loader that supports the source file and use it to load the data into or execute the script against the database.
 void shutdown(Logger logger)
          Shutdown the in-memory database.
 void start(Logger logger)
          Start the in-memory database.
 

Method Detail

getDataSource

DataSource getDataSource()
Get the data source that describes the connection to the in-memory database.

Returns:
The data source.

getDataSource

DataSource getDataSource(Map<String,String> attributes)
Get the data source that describes the connection to the in-memory database.

Parameters:
attributes - Additional connection attributes.
Returns:
The data source.

start

void start(Logger logger)
           throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
Start the in-memory database.

Parameters:
logger - Used to report errors and raise exceptions.
Throws:
org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - If the database cannot be started.

load

void load(Logger logger,
          File source)
          throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
Find the loader that supports the source file and use it to load the data into or execute the script against the database.

Parameters:
logger - Used to report errors and raise exceptions.
source - The source file containing data or script.
Throws:
org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - If there was an error loading the data or executing the script or if the source file type was not supported.

shutdown

void shutdown(Logger logger)
              throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
Shutdown the in-memory database.

Parameters:
logger - Used to report errors and raise exceptions.
Throws:
org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - If there was an error trying to shutdown the database.
